summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Fifty-first Street, in the City of Seattle, from Fifteenth Avenue Northwest to Seventeen Avenue Northwest, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 780 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
